question: Which of the following draft is attributed to Lord Macaulay?
option3: Draft of the Zamindari Abolition Act
option4: Draft of the Maritime Trade Policy
explanation: On the recommendations of the first law commission of India, which was established in 1834, The Indian Penal code was drafted in 1860 under the Charter Act of 1833. It was drafted under the Chairmanship of Thomas Babington Macaulay.
